attributes.action: All Nationalities including Europeans should have worked in this Country for at least 2 years before having free access to the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All nationalities including Europeans coming to this country should have workded here for at least two years before having the right to free access of the NHS, thus taking the strain off the NHS and at the same time have built up some NHS contributions to help towards the cost of their treatments.  I am sure that the majority of the people of this country would agree with this statement.  Thank you for listening.
